description: Detects the load of the vulnerable Dell BIOS update driver as reported in CVE-2021-21551
false_positives: Legitimate BIOS driver updates (should be rare)
name: Vulnerable Dell BIOS Update Driver Load
query: (file.path:*\\DBUtil_2_3.Sys* OR winlog.event_data.Hashes:(*0296e2ce999e67c76352613a718e11516fe1b0efc3ffdb8918fc999dd76a73a5* OR *c948ae14761095e4d76b55d9de86412258be7afd* OR *c996d7971c49252c582171d9380360f2* OR *ddbf5ecca5c8086afde1fb4f551e9e6400e94f4428fe7fb5559da5cffa654cc1* OR *10b30bdee43b3a2ec4aa63375577ade650269d25* OR *d2fd132ab7bbc6bbb87a84f026fa0244*))
author: Florian Roth
